market_positioning.position: A premium, holistic, 100% natural, vegan and cruelty‐free skincare brand offering artisanal, handcrafted products with a strong emphasis on sustainable and ethical practices.
differentiators: 100% natural ingredients with no synthetic chemicals
Handcrafted in small batches in Australia
Commitment to sustainability (eco-friendly packaging, recycling program “Sodashi Cycle”, and i=Change charitable initiative)
Holistic approach that nourishes both skin and overall wellbeing

brand_identity.mission: To create effective, natural skincare products that deeply nourish, rejuvenate, and repair the skin while supporting holistic wellbeing and sustainability.
brand_identity.vision: To transform the beauty industry by setting a higher standard for clean, ethical, and holistic skincare that enhances skin health and enriches lives.

product_offerings.name: Rejuvenating Face and Neck Moisturiser
features: Blended with plant oils such as avocado, macadamia and rosewood

product_offerings.name: Serum No. 21
features: Clinically proven formula with over 20 nutrient-rich botanicals
Suitable for all skin types including sensitive
benefits: Smooths wrinkles and refines skin texture

product_offerings.name: Cult Favourites Kit
features: Curated set of five cult-favourite products in travel-friendly sizes
Includes cleanser, face mist, mask, serum and moisturiser
benefits: Provides a complete skincare ritual customized for daily care
Offers a sampling of Sodashi’s signature formulations at a bundled value
product_offerings.pricing_strategy: Bundle pricing positioned as an exclusive online offer (approx. $89.00 AUD)

product_offerings.name: Botanical Shampoo & Conditioner
features: Infused with natural plant extracts and essential oils
Free of SLS, parabens, and synthetic fragrances
benefits: Hydrates the scalp and enhances natural shine

product_offerings.name: Body Care Range (Lotions, Creams & Oils)
features: Crafted with botanical extracts and antioxidant oils
benefits: Deeply moisturises and improves skin texture
Provides a luxurious, spa-like experience at home
product_offerings.pricing_strategy: Premium pricing with complimentary shipping Australia-wide

product_offerings.name: Jet Lag Recovery Kit
features: Includes a Recovery Gel and Recovery Mist
Formulated with energizing ingredients like ginger, lemongrass, rosemary, and peppermint
benefits: Stimulates digestion and boosts mental clarity
Refreshed, revitalized skin and mind during travel

demographics: Men and women, primarily between the ages of 25 and 65
Consumers in Australia and international markets
psychographics: Value natural, clean, and ethically produced products
Interested in holistic wellness and self-care rituals
Prefer premium, artisanal, and sustainable beauty solutions
customer_segments: Those with sensitive, combination, oily, dry, or mature skin
Consumers seeking anti-ageing and rejuvenating skincare

competitive_differentiators: 100% natural, vegan, and cruelty-free formulations without synthetic chemicals
Handcrafted in small batches in Western Australia for exceptional quality and uniqueness
Strong commitment to sustainability through ethical sourcing, eco-friendly packaging, recycling initiatives (Sodashi Cycle) and i=Change donations
Holistic philosophy that nourishes both the skin and the spirit with visible, tangible results

initiatives: i=Change Initiative: Donates $1 from every purchase to charities focused on environmental and social causes
Sodashi Cycle: A recycling program in partnership with TerraCycle and select spa partners to recycle empty product packaging
Use of eco-friendly packaging materials and commitments to ethical sourcing

customer_journey.awareness: Engaging digital presence through social media, influencer features, press mentions, and a user-friendly website with extensive skincare guides
customer_journey.interest: Attractive product pages showcasing ingredient transparency, detailed benefits, and a skincare quiz to help customers find the right regimen
customer_journey.evaluation: Strong customer testimonials, review ratings, media and award features building trust and credibility
customer_journey.decision: Clear and intuitive navigation, call-to-action buttons (Add to Cart, Buy Now), complimentary shipping, and a robust loyalty rewards program
customer_journey.sale: Seamless checkout process with multiple payment options, secure transaction gateways, and accessible customer support
customer_journey.after_sale: Comprehensive after-sale services including easy returns/exchanges, loyalty rewards credits, recycling initiatives, and ongoing customer care

design_elements: Clean, minimalist layout with a natural, earthy color palette
High-quality imagery showcasing botanical ingredients and luxurious product textures
Modern typography with elegant product presentation
Aesthetic consistency that reflects natural purity and holistic wellness
visual_identity.content_hierarchy: Prominent navigation menus segmented by product categories (Face, Body, Hair, Wellness), featured collections, best sellers, and supportive content such as skincare guides and ingredient stories

additional_notes: Founded by Megan Larsen in Western Australia, Sodashi Skincare is rooted in a philosophy of holistic beauty that not only focuses on effective and nourishing skincare but also the emotional and environmental wellbeing of its customers. The brand champions transparency, ethical practices, and sustainability, making it a leader in the clean beauty movement.
